creditline: Gift of Leila D.J. Poullada in memory of Leon B. Poullada
description: carved wood mask painted in olive greens, orange-red, tan and yellow; face with bulging eyes and tall headdress made of tangled cobras; flower-like round ear ornaments on sides with more tangled cobras above; grimacing mouth with fangs and hanging tongue; cobras on face emerging from flared nose and corners of mouth; hanging wire verso
title: Raksha (demon) mask
